h1. Create Machine
{{html:
    <hr>
<div class="form-horizontal">
    <div class="nameField">
        <h2>Name:</h2>
        <input ng-model="machine.name" type="text" class="input-xxlarge"/>
    </div>
    <div class="nameField">
        <h2>Description:</h2>
            <textarea ng-model="machine.description" type="text" class="input-xxlarge" />
    </div>
    <div class="nameField">
        <h2>OS Image</h2>

    </div>
    <div class="controls ">{{include:image_list}}</div>
    <div class="machineWrap">
        <h2>Package *:</h2>
        <div class="machineList">
            <ul class="controls" >
                <!-- {{include:plan_list}} -->
                <li ng-repeat="size in sizes | orderBy:sizepredicate">
                    <a href="" ng-model="machine.sizeId" btn-radio="size.id"
                    ng-disabled="!!(size.id*1 < oldMachine.sizeId*1)">
                    {[ numeral(size.memory * 1024 * 1024).format('0 b') ]}  Memory, </br>
                    {[ size.vcpus ]} core(s), </br>
                    {[ size.description ]}</a>
                </li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="machineWrap">
        <h2>Options:</h2>
        <div class="machineList">
            <ul class="controls" >
                <!-- {{include:plan_list}} -->
                <li ng-repeat="size in sizes | orderBy:sizepredicate">
                    <a href="" ng-model="machine.sizeId" btn-radio="size.id"
                    ng-disabled="!!(size.id*1 < oldMachine.sizeId*1)">
                    {[ numeral(size.memory * 1024 * 1024).format('0 b') ]}  Memory, </br>
                    {[ size.vcpus ]} core(s), </br>
                    {[ size.description ]}</a>
                </li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>

}}

{{html:
    <hr>
    <div>
        <h2>Increase disk size to:</h2>
        <div class="controls container" >
            {{include:storage_list}}
        </div>
    </div>
    <hr>

    <div class="form-actions">
        <button class="btn btn-info btn-large mainButton" ng-click="saveNewMachine()" ng-disabled="!isValid()">Create</button>
    </div>
    <hr>
}}
    {{div: class=msg alert alert-warning}}
	*Fair use policy for Unlimited Transfer:*
        * Small machines: &lt;= 4 cores = 1 Mbit/s average usage per month
        * Large machines: &gt;= 5 cores = 5 Mbit/s average usage per month
    _This fits 99% of our customers. If you need more bandwidth, we have special plans, contact us._
	{{div}}


{{html: </div>}}
